text: The 1993–94 Croatian Football Cup was the third edition of Croatia's football knockout competition. Hajduk Split were the defending champions, and the cup was won by Croatia Zagreb. ==Calendar== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! Round !! Main date !! Number of fixtures !! width=100 | Clubs !! October 1993|| 16 || 16 → 8 || None |- | Quarter-finals || First legs 15 and 16 March 1994, Second legs 30 March 1994|| 8 || 8 → 4 || None |- | Semi-finals || First legs 13 and 14 April 1994, Second legs 27 April 1994 || 4 || 4 → 2 || None |- | Final || First leg 1 June 1994, Second leg 15 June 1994 || 2 || 2 → 1 || None |- |} ==First round== |} ==Second round== |} ==Quarter-finals== |}
